parameters: A big mural of a closed eye.
But even if it is closed, I am still watching you.
A big mural of a closed eye.
But even if it is closed, I am still watching you.
o1
o2
o3
An altar stands before you. This is the place, where
people used to make offerings.
Do you also want to make an offering?
You look determined at the altar before you before
taking out the lyre and playing your tune.
Surprised that nothing has happened yet, you stare at
the altar.
Oh, it seems like you have finally remembered, that
you have to put your offering ON the altar.
yura sit
Or not...
Why are you sitting on the altar??
You seem to be very satisfied with your idea.
Well, it is not like you're wrong. Humans can be an
offering, too.
Since you held your offering, I will open the way
for you.
Since you held your offering, I will opened the way
for you.
A big mural of a closed eye.
But even if it is closed, I am still watching you.
A big mural of a closed eye.
But even if it is closed, I am still watching you.
You have set foot in an old temple.
This temple was once the sanctuary of the goddess Atia.
She used to be revered by the people long ago, but now
she is only a myth among many others.
You decided to inspect this location because... \!
who knows why?
Was it curiosity? A dare? Your faith?
Well, that doesn't matter - you're here now.
So you should take the chance and look into every nook
and cranny of this place.
Controls:
Controls - PC:  Arrowkeys to move
Enter to interact/confirm
Shift to run
Esc-Key to open menu

Controls - PC:  Arrowkeys to move
Enter to interact/confirm
Shift to run
Esc-Key to open menu
Controls - Mobile:
Touch screen with one finger - walk/interact/confirm
Touch screen with​ two fingers at once - open menu/back
Controls - PC:  Alternatively, you can click on
the objects ith your mouse to
interact with them
Controls - Mobile:
Touch screen with one finger - walk/interact/confirm
Touch screen with​ two fingers at once - open menu/back
